name: SUGAR Lip Scrub - 2 in 1 - Choose your flavor!
description:
*CUSTOMER FAVORITE* On sale for a limited time. 


If you haven't been properly moisturizing your lips (*ahem* check out our Flip Lip Balm!) then you may be suffering from sore lips that are cracked, dry and all around uncomfortable.

This is a brand new item that you and your lips are sure to love it! Not only does it smell and taste delicious (choose your flavor!), it will gently soothe dry lips, remove icky dead skin patches and leave your lips supple and smooth. You don't even have to put on a lip balm after use! 

To sum it up, this product has TWO uses!
1.) It gently exfoliates your lips

2.) Works as a intensive lip moisturizer/gloss

It comes in a cute little portable container (.5 oz) that will fit in any purse or make up container. You will get many uses out of one container; anywhere from 35-50 uses, depending on how much product you apply. (Just a little bit goes a long way!)

Directions:
Simply apply a small amount with a finger or lip brush and rub your lips together for super smooth lips! Remove excess residue with a tissue and enjoy your "new" lips! 

Use this Lip Scrub whenever you want your lips to feel soft and smooth! 

If your lips suffer from extreme dryness, please do not use if you feel any discomfort from the product. If product use is comfortable for your extreme case of dry lips, then give this scrub a few days use before seeing the final results.


This product is all natural with the exception of cosmetic skin/lip safe coloring and a delicious flavor/fragrance of your choice that is phthalate free (phthalate is a commonly used cosmetic chemical that is known to react poorly in sensitive individuals...none of our products contain phthalate!)

Ingredients : Organic Cane Sugar, Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Cocoa Butter, Mango Butter, Beeswax, Flavoring Oil, Cosmetic Grade Coloring

All lip products come sealed for your protection!!!

name: Body Lotion - 4 oz - Choose from TONS of fragrances!
description:
In need of a 'lighter' summer lotion, than that of our whipped body mousse? Try our newest addition!

You will receive 4 luscious ounces of our lighter (and still non greasy!) body lotion in a chic environmentally friendly silver and pink bottle. It has a convenient pump for dispensing fragrant lotion into the palm of your hand. Refills available!

Tons of fragrances available; you'll want to own them all!




Ingredients: Water, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Proysorbate-60, Stearyl Alcohol, Sunflower Oil, Allantoin, Propylene Glycol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Petrolatum, Fragrance, Diazolidinyl Urea, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Carbomer, Benzophenone-4, Stearic Acid, Cosmetic Grade Coloring
